This should contain the following information

Title: (one line describing the story)

Narrative:
As a <type of user>  
I want <some goal> 
so that <some reason>

Acceptance Criteria: (presented as Scenarios)  

Scenario: Title  
Given <context>  
  And <some more context>...  
When  <event>  
Then  <outcome>  
  And <another outcome>...
